title: Sneaky Monospaced!
content:
Hi Guys!

After scrolling through some foundries, search on identifont and myfonts' what the font. I haven't found out which font this one could be.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017173540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_5074.jpg)

If someone has some of hints I would appreciate a lot.

Thanks!
author: natenine

comments.content:
If you ignore a few small differences (like /t/S/9) it's very close to **[F25 Bank Printer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017173540/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=F25%20Bank%20Printer%20-%20Regular&fid=ef21dca7027ec5ed631305740641e6ec&fsize=24&text=Buchungsdatum%3A%2014.03.20%20BAVARIA%20LUDWIGSB%20PORSCH%201303194105175841412151&wrap=2)** free font by Volker Busse (2005)

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017173540/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

Thanks a lot man. Seriously.

It's actually very close. I might work!

Best,
